explanation: [0-0] A woman with short hair, wearing a plaid shirt, is on a street, smiling at the camera. She raises her left hand and opens her palm. Behind her, a bustling night market can be seen with various stalls and people coming and going.

[0-9] The woman points to a roadside stall with a bright smile on her face. Inside the stall, a young man wearing a mask and a young woman can be seen. The man waves, while the woman holds a mobile phone. The camera cuts to the inside of the stall, where the young man in the mask is making a cup of pearl milk tea in a plastic cup. To his right, an electric hot pot and a measuring cup can be seen. The man then opens the electric hot pot, which is filled with boiling black pearls. He scoops out pearls from it with a spoon and pours them into a transparent plastic cup. He then rotates the cup to let the pearls stick to the sides.
